document_data.name: Stokkum
document_data.mainbody:
'''Stokkum''' was a [[dwarf]] and a traveling companion of [[Tred McKnuckles]]. He had a brother named [[Bokkum]]. He was killed in [[1370 DR]] when a band of [[orc]]s and [[frost giant]]s attacked the caravan in which he was traveling. 

{{stub-person}}
